import React from 'react' import { Button, Card, Container, Form, Row } from 'react-bootstrap' import { NavLink , useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import { AUTH_ROUTE, REGISTRATION_ROUTE } from './components/utils/consts' export const Auth = () => { const location = useLocation() const isLogin = location.pathname === AUTH_ROUTE const handleSubmit = (event) => { const formData = new FormData(event.currentTarget); event.preventDefault(); for (let [key, value] of formData.entries()) { console.log(key, value); } }; return (
{/*

{isLogin? 'Авторизация' : 'Регистрация'}

{isLogin ?
Нет аккаунта? Зарегистрируйся!
:
Есть аккаунт? Войдите!
} */}
) }
